name: Deez
description: This is a unique indie game in which you have to take on the role of a skeleton mage and go through the horrific mazes of a dark dungeon.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp/vista/7/8/10 Processor: i3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 250+ mb DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: any
